channel.title: How to add portals!
channel.description:
[b][u]Introduction[/u][/b] My name is Kara67Khi. I am a java programmer(not professional) but i try my best. In this tutorial, i will be showing you how to change your Max level per skill and combat. If you find any flaws, comment and i will fix. Please don't flame.
[b][u]Status[/u][/b] Difficulty : 2/25 - Very Easy. Files editted : client.java Server deob : 317 Tested servers : Mine, Deltascape, Pkplanet(oldserver), OverloadX - Should work for all 317. Requirements : Basic java knowledge, Copying and pasting and how to read java files.
[b][u]Tutorial[/u][/b]
[b][u]Step 1[/u][/b] Open client.java and search for[code]public void makeGlobalObject[/code]
[b][u]Step 2[/u][/b] After you've found that, add this in it :[code] makeGlobalObject(X coord, Y coord, Objectid, 0, 10);[/code]
Replace the necessary (x coord - Where the Portals absX will be). Replace the necessary (y coord - Where the Portals absY will be). Replace the necessary (Objectid - The Id of the object to spawn).
[b][u]Portal Id's[/u][/b] 1812 - Portal - A magical border of teleportation. 2156 - Magic Portal - A magical portal of teleportation. 2157 - Magic Portal - A magical portal of teleportation. 2158 - Magic Portal - A magical portal of teleportation. 2465 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2466 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2467 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2468 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2469 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2470 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2471 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2472 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2473 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2474 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2475 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2476 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2477 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2492 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 4151 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 4152 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 4153 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 4154 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 4155 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 4156 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 4157 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place. 2880 - Mystic portal - There seems to be some sort of magical field here.
[u][b]C'Wars Portals[/b][/u] 4387 - Saradomin Portal - A portal to join the Saradomin team. 4388 - Zamorak Portal - A portal to join the Zamorak team. 4389 - Portal - A portal to leave the Saradomin team. 4390 - Portal - A portal to leave the Zamorak team. 4406 - Portal - A portal to leave the Saradomin team. 4407 - Portal - A portal to leave the Zamorak team. 4408 - Guthix Portal - A portal to join a random team. 6282 - Portal - A portal to another land? 6551 - Portal - A portal that leads you out of the pyramid.
[b][u]Step 2[/u][/b] Search for [code]if(objectID ==[/code]
underneath one of those codes, add this [code]if(objectID == ^&^%){ toX = 6666; toY = 8888; heightLevel = %; }[/code] Replace ^&^% with object id Replace 6666 with X coords Replace 8888 with Y coords Replace % with the height level.
There are more link for object id's :Objectid.txt - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?j47v79dtbug5ihg]http://www.mediafire.com/?j47v79dtbug5ihg[/url] [u][b]End code[/b][/u] First end code : [code] makeGlobalObject(X coord, Y coord, Objectid, 0, 10);[/code] Second [code]if(objectID == ^&^%){ toX = 6666; toY = 8888; heightLevel = %; }[/code]
Now say you want to add a Portal what needs special rights.. Like a donator portal!
Instead of this code :[code]if(objectID == ^&^%){ toX = 6666; toY = 8888; heightLevel = %; }[/code] Use this! [code]if (objectID == 2465 && donator == 1) { toX = 2338; toY = 3170; } else sM("You need to be Donator to go to this spot, donate now!!"); }[/code] [b][u]Frequently Asked Questions :confused[/u][/b] What is heightLevel? - Level height is how high above ground your player is. Eg. Height = 1 Is like going up 1 flight of stairs.
I cannot compile says Cannot find specified path. - Edit the compiler and you should get this [code]@echo off Title !Build Game Programme "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code] Change jdk1.6.0.21 to whatever jdk version you have.
Can you do it for me? - Yes i can. But ill rip you like charge you $ 10 USD :D add my msn - shaq_cameron@hotmail.com [b][u]Credits[/u][/b] 2% Delta - making code 2% My brother - getting Object.txt 96% me - making everything else.

item.title: How to add portals!
item.dc:creator: @TaF TaF
item.description:
@TaF wrote:

Introduction
My name is Kara67Khi. I am a java programmer(not professional) but i try my best. In this tutorial, i will be showing you how to change your Max level per skill and combat. If you find any flaws, comment and i will fix. Please don’t flame.

Status
Difficulty : 2/25 - Very Easy.
Files editted : client.java
Server deob : 317
Tested servers : Mine, Deltascape, Pkplanet(oldserver), OverloadX - Should work for all 317.
Requirements : Basic java knowledge, Copying and pasting and how to read java files.

Tutorial

Step 1
Open client.java and search forpublic void makeGlobalObject

Step 2
After you’ve found that, add this in it : makeGlobalObject(X coord, Y coord, Objectid, 0, 10);

Replace the necessary (x coord - Where the Portals absX will be).
Replace the necessary (y coord - Where the Portals absY will be).
Replace the necessary (Objectid - The Id of the object to spawn).

Portal Id’s
1812 - Portal - A magical border of teleportation.
2156 - Magic Portal - A magical portal of teleportation.
2157 - Magic Portal - A magical portal of teleportation.
2158 - Magic Portal - A magical portal of teleportation.
2465 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2466 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2467 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2468 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2469 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2470 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2471 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2472 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2473 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2474 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2475 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2476 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2477 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2492 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
4151 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
4152 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
4153 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
4154 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
4155 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
4156 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
4157 - Portal - A portal from this mystical place.
2880 - Mystic portal - There seems to be some sort of magical field here.

C’Wars Portals
4387 - Saradomin Portal - A portal to join the Saradomin team.
4388 - Zamorak Portal - A portal to join the Zamorak team.
4389 - Portal - A portal to leave the Saradomin team.
4390 - Portal - A portal to leave the Zamorak team.
4406 - Portal - A portal to leave the Saradomin team.
4407 - Portal - A portal to leave the Zamorak team.
4408 - Guthix Portal - A portal to join a random team.
6282 - Portal - A portal to another land?
6551 - Portal - A portal that leads you out of the pyramid.

Step 2
Search for if(objectID ==

underneath one of those codes, add this if(objectID == ^&^%){ toX = 6666; toY = 8888; heightLevel = %; }
Replace ^&^% with object id
Replace 6666 with X coords
Replace 8888 with Y coords
Replace % with the height level.

There are more link for object id’s :Objectid.txt - http://www.mediafire.com/?j47v79dtbug5ihg
End code
First end code :

           makeGlobalObject(X coord, Y coord, Objectid, 0, 10);

Second if(objectID == ^&^%){ toX = 6666; toY = 8888; heightLevel = %; }

Now say you want to add a Portal what needs special rights…
Like a donator portal!

Instead of this code :if(objectID == ^&^%){ toX = 6666; toY = 8888; heightLevel = %; }
Use this!

if (objectID == 2465 && donator == 1) { toX = 2338; toY = 3170; } else sM("You need to be Donator to go to this spot, donate now!!"); }
Frequently Asked Questions :confused
What is heightLevel? - Level height is how high above ground your player is.
Eg. Height = 1 Is like going up 1 flight of stairs.

I cannot compile says Cannot find specified path. - Edit the compiler and you should get this @echo off Title !Build Game Programme "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Change jdk1.6.0.21 to whatever jdk version you have.

Can you do it for me? - Yes i can. But ill rip you like charge you $ 10 USD
add my msn - shaq_cameron@hotmail.com
Credits
2% Delta - making code
2% My brother - getting Object.txt
96% me - making everything else.

Read full topic
